Text:
Download took 4 minutes, really fast.
The quality of audio and video is really good, but has the subtitles stuck to the video.
They're in english, so it's not to big of a problem.

thanks for the upload
It's not stuck to the video :p   There's a .srt file which is the subtitles file....once you delete or rename it, the subtitles is gone for good ;)
